prompts: Create an owl-like Pokemon with a green body and big, expressive eyes.
Show me a small bird Pokemon that blends well in forest habitats.
Design a playful nocturnal Pokemon that has a round shape and unique feathers.
Imagine a cute flying Pokemon with a bright yellow belly and distinct black accents.
Generate a whimsical creature that resembles an owl and has vibrant eye colors.

Give me a small, round bird-like Pokemon that is friendly and loves to explore.
